alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:46PM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of one to four inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Caledonia, Essex and Orleans Counties in Vermont. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light glaze of ice is possible Christmas morning before precipitation becomes all snow. The snow will continue right through Sunday morning and make for potentially difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
